snippet.title: Materializing new units in v0.3
snippet.description: I've made this quick "tutorial" showing how to launch the game and how to make new units. You basically select the ultimate ability from Dark Priest, pick a unit, click the big button under the cards, pick an available location nearby then click to confirm. Pretty simple stuff.
